content: free pattern for boho christmas crochet baubles i made mine in a sportsweight weight yarn scheepjes catona and 3mm crochet hook you could also use a dk weight yarn but you may need to leave out round 5… experiment and fit on your bauble as you go and you will soon find what s perfect for you if you use a 4 ply weight yarn you may need to repeat row 6 once or twice more to make your crochet piece large enough to fit your bauble try it on as you go remembering that it needs to be a tight fit you can easily stretch the 2 pieces as you sew them together you will have a better fit if your final piece is slightly smaller than your bauble… as you stretch it will settle into place and give you a nice firm decoration make loads in all your favourite colours they make lovely holiday gifts just add them to a box with some tissue paper
